name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, Open Haiku Reader”
”Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to give me a Haiku”
”Ask Haiku Reader to say a Haiku”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des: Use Haiku Reader to select for you a classic or modern Haiku poem. "Ask Haiku Reader to read me a Haiku" or simply "Give me a Haiku" to start listening.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
